name: Dungeons of Tal'Doria
description: Welcome to the world of Dungeons of Tal'Doria! Explore unique biomes, defeat countless enemies, evolve your character, discover dungeons and more!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or better Processor: Intel Core i5-2XXX / AMD Phenom II X4 with 2.5GHz or better Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce GTX 5xx 1GB / Radeon HD 6750 1GB or better DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 500 MB available space Additional Notes: Requires broadband internet connection for multiplayer
